author: joakime
msg: (NOT COMPLETE YET) Commiting what I have for stability and memory utilization so far, wanted to confer with brett about changes.

* Overhauled archiva-discoverer to use a walker / publish / consumer type interface instead of in-memory lists of files.  This has had a reduction in memory over large repositories.  Expect an average of memory reduction of (22MB * Managed Repository Count).
* Overhauled archiva-reports-standard to use jpox as opposed to xml store to reduce memory usage.  Expect an average memory reduction of (45MB * Managed Repository Count).

author: mlovett
msg: Clean up setting the acksTo for sequences, and move inbound sequence info onto the operation context

author: jaz
msg: can now use this permission as a service call; enabled required parameters to be passed in through the definition as well as inline minilang
